mapper.select: select * from business_info order by overall_grade desc;
select business_info_idx from business_info where business_id = #{businessId}
mapper.update: update business_info set use_time = #{useTime}, content = #{content}, amenities = #{amenities} where business_info_idx = #{businessInfoIdx}
mapper.select: select max(reply_num) from replies where user_id=#{userId}
select count(*) from replies where board_num=#{boardNum}
select * from replies where board_num=#{boardNum} limit #{cri.startrow},#{cri.amount}
mapper.update: update replies set reply_contents=#{replyContents}, update_date=now() where reply_num=#{replyNum}
update business_info set visit_count = visit_count + '1' , grade_count = grade_count + '1' where business_info_idx = #{businessInfoIdx}
update business_info set visit_count = visit_count - 1,grade_count = grade_count - 1 where business_info_idx = #{businessInfoIdx}
mapper.select: select ifnull(avg(grade),0) from replies where board_num = ${businessInfoIdx}
mapper.update: update business_info set overall_grade = #{allGrade} where business_info_idx = #{businessInfoIdx};
